Cam::

She kept hugging him. "I miss mommy and daddy.I miss home. You and 
her are the only ones like me. I don't mind if your not red." She 
sobbed and cried while hugging him.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The larger bot hugged the little girl back.
> 
> Blackfang: I wish she could stay with us too. But maybe if you ask 
her
> nicely, maybe then she'll think about it... We'll have to wait till
> she wakes up, though.
>
